mdRecord.dcterms:title: Queen Marie Visits Mount Vernon, October 19, 1926
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Maxey, Mary Frances Campbell (Mrs. Thomas Sheldon Maxey), d. 1938
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Newspaper clipping with caption that reads: WHAT - NO PHOTOS? - When the Queen visited Mt. Vernon, Superintendent Dodge suddenly decided that no photographs would be made. A cameraman caught him as he threw up a restraining hand. The Rumanian ruler, at his side, lifted her head to be sure that his hand would miss her. Clipping is adhered to heavy paper, below is written: Queen Marie and Supt., Mrs Maxey in background, Oct. 19, 1926.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
